verses.name: Job 22:13
verses.text: And thou sayest, How doth God know? can he judge through the dark cloud?

verses.name: Job 22:14
verses.text: Thick clouds are a covering to him, that he seeth not; and he walketh in the circuit of heaven.

verses.name: Job 22:15
verses.text: Hast thou marked the old way which wicked men have trodden?

verses.name: Job 22:16
verses.text: Which were cut down out of time, whose foundation was overflown with a flood:

verses.name: Job 22:17
verses.text: Which said unto God, Depart from us: and what can the Almighty do for them?

verses.name: Job 22:18
verses.text: Yet he filled their houses with good things: but the counsel of the wicked is far from me.
